Verses: 1 avanaik Kolaiseygiradharkuch Savulum Sammadhiththirundhaan. Akkaalaththile Erusalemilulla Sabaikku Migundha Thunbam Undaayitru. Apposthalarthavira, Matra Yaavarum Yoodheyaa Samaariyaa Dhesangalil Sidharappattupponaargal.
2 dheva Bakthiyulla Manushar Sthevaanai Eduththu Adakkampanni, Avanukkaaga Migavum Dhukkankondaadinaargal
3 savul Veedugaldhorum Nuzhaindhu, Purusharaiyum Sthireegalaiyum Izhuththukkondupoi, Kaavalil Poduviththu, Sabaiyaip Paazhaakkikkondirundhaan.
4 sidharipponavargal Engunthirindhu, Suvisesha Vasanaththaip Pirasangiththaargal.
5 appozhudhu Pilippenbavan Samaariyaavilulla Oru Pattanaththirkup Poi, Angullavargalukku Pirasangiththaan.
6 pilippu Seydha Adhisayangalai Janangal Kelvippattu Kandu, Avanaal Sollappattavaigalai Orumanappattuk Gavaniththaargal.
7 anegarilirundha Asuththaaavigal Migundha Saththaththode Kooppittu Avargalai Vittup Purappattadhu. Anegan Thimirvaadhakkaararum Sappaanigalum Gunamaakkappattaargal.
8 andhap Pattanaththile Migundha Sandhosham Undaayitru.
9 seemon Endru Perkonda Orumanushan Andhap Pattanaththile Maayaviththaikkaaranaayirundhu, Thannai Oru Periyavanendru Solli, Samaariyaanaattu Janangalaip Biramikkappannikkondirundhaan.
10 dhevanudaiya Peridhaana Sakthi Ivandhaan Endru Enni, Siriyor Periyor Yaavarum Avanukkuch Sevikoduththuvandhaargal.
11 avan Anega Kaalamaaith Thannudaiya Maayaviththaigalinaale Avargalaip Biramikkappanninadhinaal Avanai Madhiththuvandhaargal.
12 dhevanudaiya Raajyaththukkum Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Naamaththukkum Etravaigalaikkuriththu, Pilippu Pirasangiththadhai Avargal Visuvaasiththabodhu, Purusharum Sthireegalum Gnaanasnaanampetraargal.
13 appozhudhu Seemonum Visuvaasiththu Gnaanasnaanam Petru, Pilippaippatrikkondu, Avanaal Nadandha Adaiyaalangalaiyum Periya Arpudhangalaiyumkandu Biramiththaan.
14 samaariyar Dhevavasanaththai Etrukkondadhai Erusalemilulla Apposthalargal Kelvippattu, Pedhuruvaiyum Yovaanaiyum Avargalidaththirku Anuppinaargal.
15 ivargal Vandhapozhudhu Avargaliloruvanum Parisuththa Aaviyaip Peraamal Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththinaale Gnaanasnaanaththai Maaththiram Petrirundhavargalaagak Kandu,
16 avargal Parisuththa Aaviyaip Petrukkollumpadi Avargalukkaaga Jebampanni,
17 avargalmel Kaigalai Vaiththaargal, Appozhudhu Avargal Parisuththa Aaviyaip Petraargal.
18 apposthalar Thangal Kaigalai Avargalmel Vaiththadhinaal Parisuththa Aavi Thandharulappadugiradhaich Seemon Kandabodhu, Avargalidaththil Panaththaik Konduvandhu:
19 naan Evanmel En Kaigalai Vaikkireno, Avan Parisuththa Aaviyaip Peraththakkadhaaga Enakkum Indha Adhigaaraththaik Kodukkavendum Endraan.
20 pedhuru Avanai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Varaththaip Panaththinaale Sambaadhiththukkollalaamendru Nee Ninaiththapadiyaal Un Panam Unnodekooda Naasamaaip Pogakkadavadhu.
21 un Irudhayam Dhevanukkumunbaagach Semmaiyaayiraadhapadiyaal, Indha Vishayaththile Unakkup Pangumillai Paagamumillai.
22 aagaiyaal Nee Un Dhurkgunaththai Vittu Mananthirumbi, Dhevanai Nokki Vendikkol; Oruvelai Un Irudhayaththin Ennam Unakku Mannikkappadalaam.
23 nee Kasappaana Pichchilum Paavakkattilum Agappattirukkiradhaagak Kaangiren Endraan.
24 adharkuch Seemon: Neengal Sonna Kaariyangalil Ondrum Enakku Neridaadhapadikku, Enakkaagak Karththarai Vendikkollungal Endraan.
25 ivvidhamaai Avargal Karththardaiya Vasanaththaich Saatchiyaai Ariviththuch Sonnapinbu, Samaariyarudaiya Anega Giraamangalil Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu, Erusalemukkuth Thirumbivandhaargal.
26 pinbu Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Pilippai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu, Therku Mugamaai Erusalemilirundhu Gaasaa Pattanaththukkup Pogira Vanaandharamaarkkamaaip Po Endraan.

27 andhappadi Avan Ezhundhu Ponaan. Appozhudhu Eththiyoppiyarudaiya Raajasthireeyaagiya Kandhaage Enbavalukku Mandhiriyum Avaludaiya Pokkishamellaavatrirkum Thalaivanumaayirundha Eththiyoppiyanaagiya Oruvan Panindhukollumpadi Erusalemukku Vandhirundhu;
28 oorukkuth Thirumbippogumbodhu, Than Radhaththile Utkaarndhu, Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyin Aagamaththai Vaasiththukkondirundhaan.
29 aaviyaanavar: Nee Poi, Andha Radhaththudane Serndhukol Endru Pilippudane Sonnaar;
30 appozhudhu Pilippu Odippoichserndhu, Avan Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyin Aagamaththai Vaasikkiradhaik Kettu: Neer Vaasikkiravaigalin Karuththu Umakkuth Theriyumaa Endraan.
31 adharku Avan: Oruvan Enakkuth Therivikkaavittaal Adhu Enakku Eppadith Theriyum Endru Solli; Pilippu Eri, Thannode Utkaarumpadi Avanai Vendikkondaan.

32 avan Vaasiththa Vedhavaakkiyamennavendraal; Avar Oru Aattaippola Adikkappaduvadharkuk Kondu Pogappattaar; Mayirkkaththarikkiravanukku Munbaagach Saththamidaadhirukkira Aattukkuttiyaippola Avar Thamadhu Vaayaith Thiravaadhirundhaar.
33 avar Thammaith Thaazhththinabodhu Avarudaiya Niyaayam Eduththuppodappattadhu; Avarudaiya Jeevan Boomiyilirundhu Edupattuppoyitru; Avarudaiya Vamsaththai Yaaraale Sollimudiyum Enbadhe.
34 mandhiri Pilippai Nokki: Theerkkadharisi Yaaraikkuriththu Idhaich Sollugiraar? Thammaikkuriththo, Veroruvaraikkuriththo? Enakkuch Sollavendum Endru Kettukkondaan.
35 appozhudhu Pilippu Pesaththodangi, Indha Vedhavaakkiyaththai Munnittu Yesuvaikkuriththu Avanukkuppirasangiththaan.
36 ivvidhamaai Avargal Vazhinadandhupogaiyil, Thanneerulla Oridaththirku Vandhaargal. Appozhudhu Mandhiri: Idho, Thanneer Irukkiradhe, Naan Gnaanasnaanam Perugiradharkuth Thadaiyenna Endraan.
37 adharkup Pilippu: Neer Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Visuvaasiththaal Thadaiyillaiyendraan. Appozhudhu Avan Yesukiristhuvai Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranendru Visuvaasikkiren Endru Solli;
38 radhaththai Niruththachsonnaan. Appozhudhu Pilippum Mandhiriyum Aagiya Iruvarum Thanneeril Iranginaargal, Pilippu Avanukku Gnaanasnaanankoduththaan.
39 avargal Thanneerilirundhu Karaiyerinapozhudhu Karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Pilippaik Kondupoivittaar. Mandhiri Appuram Avanaik Kaanaamal, Sandhoshaththode Than Vazhiye Ponaan.
40 pilippu Aasoththile Kaanappattu, Avvidaththilirundhu Pirayaanam Panni Sesariyaavukku Varugiravaraiyil Sagala Pattanangalilum Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththukkonduvandhaan
